document: <sentence id="s1" text="RNA sequencing transcriptome analysis revealed that inflammatory mediators such as tumor necrosis factor (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II)-Î± suppressed expression of R-spondin-1 (positive regulation of protein phosphorylation, a critical growth factor for intestinal epithelial cells) in regulation of double-strand break repair via homologous recombination-silenced YAMC cells li>in vitro.">
